priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Collected Summarized Value Type Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C177908

self.title: CDISC SDTM Collected Summarized Value Type Response Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist relevant to the summary type for the source collected result or dose value.
name: Collected Summarized Value Type Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Collected Summarized Value Type Response Terminology

terms.definition: The largest value in quantity or degree in a set of values.
A mean of a set of observations where the mathematic calculation is unspecified or unknown.
The sum of the values of all observations or data points divided by the number of observations; an arithmetic average. (CDISC Glossary)
The n-th root of the multiple products of n values; a geometric average.
The middle value in an ordered set of values. In the case of an even number of values, it is the average of the two middle values.
The smallest value in quantity or degree in a set of values.
The lowest value in terms of position, place, magnitude, level, or rank.
